doc:
Peter Graves https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Peter_Graves 0 Peter Graves (born Peter Duesler Aurness; March 18, 1926 – March 14, 2010) was an American film and television actor. He was best known for his role as Jim Phelps in the CBS television series Mission: Impossible from 1967 to 1973 (original) and from 1988 to 1990 (revival). His elder brother was actor James Arness (1923–2011). Graves was also known for his portrayal of airplane pilot Captain Clarence Oveur in the 1980 comedy film Airplane! and its 1982 sequel Airplane II: The Sequel. Peter_Graves ( born Peter_Duesler_Aurness ; March_18_,_1926 – March_14_,_2010 ) was an_American_film_and_television_actor . He was_best_known for his_role as Jim_Phelps in the_CBS_television_series_Mission : Impossible from 1967 to 1973_(_original_) and from 1988 to 1990_(_revival_) . His_elder_brother was actor_James_Arness_(_1923 – 2011_) . Graves was_also_known for his_portrayal of airplane_pilot_Captain_Clarence_Oveur in the_1980_comedy_film_Airplane ! and its_1982_sequel_Airplane_II : The_Sequel .
